SEARCH
Package engine.forBoard

Class MoveUtils

java.lang.Object
engine.forBoard.MoveUtils
public class MoveUtils extends Object
The `MoveUtils` class is a utility class that provides various helper methods related to chess moves and calculations. It includes methods for obtaining exchange scores, managing coordinate lines, and handling null moves.
Author:
Aaron Ho

  • Method Details

    • exchangeScore

      public static int exchangeScore(Move move)
      Computes the exchange score of a given move, indicating the relative value of pieces involved in the move. Higher exchange scores suggest advantageous exchanges for the player.
      Parameters:
      move - The move for which the exchange score is calculated.
      Returns:
      The computed exchange score for the move.
